thread.title: 9 Rugged, Handmade Accessories You Need In Your Life
thread.title_full: 9 Rugged, Handmade Accessories You Need In Your Life

author: jnosek1
title: 9 Rugged, Handmade Accessories You Need In Your Life
text:
9 Rugged, Handmade Accessories You Need In Your Life You’re going to want this leather-wrapped flask and iPhone case that outlasts your iPhone By Dan Michel February 24, 2017 
Rustic, handmade accessories are some of the most stylish things you can add to your wardrobe. They give your outfits a little edge—even a suit-and-tie guy can toughen up his office wear with a handmade wallet or woody fragrance. Here are nine of the best.
